attributes.action: British taxpayers should not fund another Scottish Referendum
attributes.background: If Mrs Sturgeon wants another Referendum then the British Taxpayers should not have to fund it

rejection.details: People who pay tax in Scotland are also British taxpayers, so it's not clear how you would like a future referendum to be funded. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking the UK Government not to provide any funding to meet the costs of a referendum
